title.narrative: Strengthening the Accountancy Profession in Ghana - phase 2 extension

description.narrative:
The second phase of a project to strengthen accountancy education in Ghana through support to the Institute of Chartered Accountants Ghana (ICAG) by the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales (ICAEW).
The project focuses on increasing ICAG's relevance and value to its members, students and stakeholders, and facilitating the adoption and implementation of international standards in Ghana by focusing on education, training, and high-quality professional qualification.
Launched under the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC) Professional Accounting Organization (PAO) Capacity Building Program funded by DFID.
To build on previous work to strengthen the design and delivery of ICAG’s professional accountancy education, training, and examinations.
